definition: surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

sentences.english: Newton's law is not applicable to any case.
sentences.chinese: 牛顿定律并不适合于任何情况。

sentences.english: Russia, a major oil producer, is unlikely to embrace any ambitious emissions reductions.
sentences.chinese: 产油大国俄罗斯不太可能欢迎任何大幅减排计划。

sentences.english: A visit to one of these places is well worth while.
sentences.chinese: 这些地方的任何一处都是很值得一去的。

sentences.english: At the end of the term, you typically get no cash back.
sentences.chinese: 固定年限到期后，你一般不会得到任何现金返还。

sentences.english: The garbage collection pause times are the most significant delays any threads encounter.
sentences.chinese: 垃圾收集停顿时间是任何线程遇到的最显著的延迟。

sentences.english: When you’re a kid, you cannot go anywhere by yourself.
sentences.chinese: 当你是一个孩子的时候，你不能自己去任何地方。

sentences.english: Any liquid could be solidified under the certain conditions.
sentences.chinese: 任何液体在一定条件下均可固化。

sentences.english: Trace hooks can be applied at the entry or exit of any function.
sentences.chinese: 跟踪钩子可以应用于任何函数的入口或出口。

sentences.english: The people who allowed torture have faced no punishment at all.
sentences.chinese: 而那些允许酷刑的人却不会受到任何处罚。

sentences.english: There is no threat or force involved.
sentences.chinese: 它不涉及任何威胁或者武力。

sentences.english: We don't have any information from inside the plant.
sentences.chinese: 我们还没有任何来自核电站里面的消息，这是个问题。

sentences.english: The subject of any other monograph must comply throughout its period of use.
sentences.chinese: 任何另外的专论的内容必须遵守其使用周期。

sentences.english: It does not overwrite any cell-level information.
sentences.chinese: 它没有覆盖任何元级消息。

sentences.english: Agnes hasn't added or RSVPed to any events yet.
sentences.chinese: 尚未添加或回复任何事件。

sentences.english: If no domain is registered, the money is refunded in full.
sentences.chinese: 如果客户没有注册任何域名，那么保证金将全部返还。

sentences.english: The reason I didn't score any points last year was because we were gamblers.
sentences.chinese: 去年我没有获得任何积分的原因是我们是赌棍。

definition: other/the others/else/other than it/in addition to the thing mentioned above
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
haven't/hasn't/doesn't exist/to not have/to not be
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
the slightest amount or degree/a bit
always/at all times/never (if used in negative sentence)
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
